description:
If DIY is your kind of language, this kit will help you replace the cables on bikes with SRAM and Shimano 5-7 speed derailleurs.

  • Designed for use with 5-7 speed road and mountain derailleurs
  • Weld cut inner cables for smooth installation
  • Galvanized, linear, non-lubed cables are low friction for smooth reliable shifting
  • Includes everything needed for a complete shift cable and housing replacement for front and rear derailleurs. 1 x 2000mm LEX shift housing, 2 x 2300mm shift inner cable, 10 x nylon open end caps, and 2 x cable tips
name: Jagwire Shimano/SRAM Shifter Cable and Housing Set DIY Kit
